text: I breathe where I cannot see, and still the ground holds me.
author: AFW

text: Trust grows quiet roots beneath unanswered questions.
author: AFW

text: In the pause between heartbeats, a way opens.
author: AFW

text: I step forward as if the light already knows my name.
author: AFW

text: Some doors are opened by gentleness alone.
author: AFW

text: My doubt is not a ceiling; it is weather passing.
author: AFW

text: I release what is not mine to carry and feel taller.
author: AFW

text: Today I practice belonging to the present moment.
author: AFW

text: I am met by mercy I did not earn and cannot lose.
author: AFW

text: The dark is not empty; it is seedtime.
author: AFW

text: I choose fidelity to the next kind thing.
author: AFW

text: Silence speaks fluent hope.
author: AFW

text: A single honest breath is a prayer.
author: AFW

text: I trust the slow choreography of healing.
author: AFW

text: I am held by more than I can measure.
author: AFW

text: I do the small faithful work that changes everything.
author: AFW

text: I put my weight on goodness and it holds.
author: AFW

text: I plant courage where fear expected vacancy.
author: AFW

text: Ancient kindness walks beside me.
author: AFW

text: I meet mystery with a soft spine and open palms.
author: AFW
